page.title: 07LIVE AID CONCERT
page.content: On the 13th July 1985 a concert will be held at Wembley Arena,London. Another concert will be held at exactly the same time in New Jersey, Philidelphia.Each group/artist will have 15 minutes on stage.Each concert will have someone on stage alternately .The concerts will be beamed live all over the world by satellite. Bob Geldoff organised the concerts. Some of the people playing will be: Wham;Duran Duran and Elton John. BBC1 and 2 will be broadcasting the concert so will Radio 1 and 2.It will start at noon and finish about 4am the next morning.The proceeds will go to the famine stricken areas of Africa.Two songs have already been released for Ethiopia, one from England called "Do They Know It's Christmas?" and one from America called "We Are The World".
